resources:
Mahiru LoginActivity Email Password Sign in or register Login "Welcome !" Not a valid username Password must be >5 characters "Login failed" Home Setting Recycle Bin Account My Profile Change Password Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Share Delete More Share content Delete content More options Welcome to Mahiru Box Remember me Forgot password Sign up Don\'t have account? Save to device Register Sign up Create your new account Cancel Save 1dp Reset your password Reset Enter old password Enter new password Confirm new password Update Select the following methods to\nprovide feedback to the developer Introduce about Mahiru Box Mahiru is a media storage app, created to store photos, videos, musics and completely free of charge. For more information, contact via email: meomeo123@gmail.com Full name Save 1. Dark mode 2. Language Choose language: Vietnamese English 3. Clear cache How to upload photos/videos/music? To upload photos/videos/music, tap the upload button or long-press the upload button to select the file you want to upload How to download photos/videos/music to your phone? To download photos/videos/music to your phone, long-press the photo/video/music you want to download, then tap the More (three vertical dots) button and tap Download image Undo Select All Sort Image Video Music Cut Draw Filter Edit Recover Sign Out Feedback Information Support Application
--check_internet--- OOPS! No Internet connection Please check your connection Retry Network connection lost Please check your network! MapsActivity Channel 1 Mieu ta cho channel 1
--Option-- Confirm Application Exit Are you sure you want to exit the application? Yes Cancel Confirm Sign Out Are you sure you want to sign out? You have successfully logged out! Error reloading user information Please grant access permissions! Select Image
--Registration-- Email must not be empty and must be a Gmail address!!! Password must contain at least 1 uppercase letter, 1 lowercase letter, 1 number, and at least 6 characters Waiting for verification Account already exists!!! Verification email sent Error checking account Verifying... Account verified! Account created successfully! Account not verified. Please check your email and try again later. Your account has been deleted!!! Failed to create account. Please check the information and try again later. By signing up, you agree to our term of use\n and privacy notice
--Login-- Retry Login You have exceeded the maximum number of login attempts. Please wait 30 seconds before trying again. Please wait %1$d seconds before trying again. OK Logging in automatically... Automatic login failed! Saved account does not exist Automatic login failed! Please check your account or network. Automatic login failed! Please check your account! Welcome to Mahiru photo storage! Automatic login successful! Automatic login failed! Please check your password or network. Login failed! This account does not exist. Login failed! Please check your account! Incorrect username or password. Login successful! Incorrect password! Please re-enter your password.
--EditImageActivity and EditImageProActivity-- Image error! Uploading... Please wait... Image saved successfully!
--Restore-- Restore music successfully Invalid email! Account does not exist! Error checking account! Please check your email to enter a new password! Enter your email address and we will send you\n instructions to reset your password
--BinMusic and MusicAdapter-- Are you sure you want to permanently delete the selected music? Error deleting music! Undoing music... Error undoing music! Rename file File renamed successfully! Error deleting current file Error creating new file Error copying file content Sharing music failed. Deleting music... Music deleted successfully! Error moving music to trash folder Error downloading music Music downloaded successfully! Failed to download music Share music Downloading music...
--FullscreenImage and BinAdapter-- Are you sure you want to permanently delete this image? Are you sure you want to undo this image? Deleting image... Error deleting image Undoing image... Image undone successfully! Error undoing image! Image path error! Choose image editing: Simple Professional Share image Failed to share image Image deleted successfully! Failed to delete image Are you sure you want to delete the selected images? Error moving image to trash folder. Error downloading image! Downloading image... Image downloaded successfully! Failed to download image
--BinVideo and VideoAdapter-- Are you sure you want to delete the selected video? Deleting video... Video deleted successfully! Error deleting video! Undoing video... Video undone successfully! Video error Error undoing video Video path error Failed to share video! Error deleting video to trash Video file error Downloading video... Video downloaded successfully! Failed to download video Share video
--ChangePassword-- Retry Password Change You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts. Please wait 30 seconds before trying again. Please wait %1$d seconds before trying again. OK Password updated successfully! Please log in again! Failed to update password! Incorrect old password! Please enter your password again! Please enter your old password Please enter a new password Please re-enter the new password Please enter at least 6 characters! Password must contain at least one uppercase letter Password must contain at least one lowercase letter Password must contain at least one number Change password
--Home-- Image uploaded successfully Upload successful Video uploaded successfully
--MyProfile-- Edit my profile Please enter a username Updating... Username updated successfully! Failed to update username! Please select a profile picture Failed to update profile picture! Failed to upload image: Profile picture updated successfully! Failed to save profile picture:
--Setting-- Deleted successfully Settings Tap to enable
--Contact-- Contact us Email us Send us an email and we\'ll get back to you. Call us Available weekdays: 9:00AM - 4:30PM
